title: Tangled Series Audiobooks (1-4) by Emma Chase
description:
Tangled (Tangled Book 1) by Emma Chase
======================================
English | MP3 64kbps CBR | 08:00:51 | ISBN: 1442370599 | 220 MB
Genre: Contemporary Romance | Narrator: Sebastian York


When rich, handsome, and arrogant meets beautiful, brilliant, and ambitious, things are bound to get tangled.

Drew Evans makes multimillion-dollar business deals and seduces New Yorkâ€™s most beautiful women with just a smile. So why has he been shuttered in his apartment for seven days, miserable and depressed? Heâ€™ll tell you he has the flu, but we all know thatâ€™s not really true.

When Katherine Brooks is hired as the new associate at Drewâ€™s fatherâ€™s investment banking firm, every aspect of the dashing playboyâ€™s life is thrown into a tailspin. The professional competition she brings is unnerving, his attraction to her is distracting, his failure to entice her into his bed is exasperating.

How can one woman turn a smooth-talking player into a broken, desperate man? By making the one thing he never wanted in life the only thing he canâ€™t live without.


Holy Frigging Matrimony: A Tangled Series Short Story (Tangled Book 1.5) by Emma Chase
======================================================================================
English | MP3 32kbps CBR | 52:22 | ISBN: 1442377607 | 11.9 MB
Genre: Contemporary Romance | Narrator: Sebastian York


What does Drew Evans have to say next? Find out in this forty page short story, filled with his sexy charm, unique advice and hilarious one-liners.

Marriage: the final frontier. Steven went first. He was kind of our test subject. Like those monkeys that NASA sent off into space in the fifties, all the while knowing theyâ€™d never make it back.

And now another poor rocket is ready to launch.

But this isnâ€™t just any posh New York wedding. Youâ€™ve seen my friends, youâ€™ve met our families, you know you're in for a treat. Everyone wants their wedding to be memorable. This oneâ€™s going to be un-frigging-forgettable.

Holy Frigging Matrimony takes place about a year after Tangledâ€™s end and is from Drewâ€™s POV.


Twisted (Tangled Book 2) by Emma Chase
======================================
English | MP3 64kbps CBR | 07:02:13 | ISBN: 1442370602 | 193 MB
Genre: Contemporary Romance | Narrator: Charlotte Penfield & Sebastian York


When spontaneous and carefree meets cautious and responsible, falling in love can get just a little Twisted.

There are two kinds of people in this world: the ones who look first, and the ones who leap. Iâ€™ve always been more of a looker. A planner. Cautious. Then I met Drew Evans. He was so persistent. So sure of himself. He made it easy to leap with him.

Did you think Drew and I were going to ride off into the sunset and live happily ever after? So did I. But life is about choices, and Drew already made his. In fact, he tried to decide for the both of usâ€”but you know thatâ€™s not my style. So I came back to Greenville, to spend some time alone... sort of.

Because old habits die hard, and sometimes you have to go back to where you began before you can move ahead again.


Tamed (Tangled Book 3) by Emma Chase
====================================
English | MP3 64kbps CBR | 05:42:58 | ISBN: 1442370610 | 157 MB
Genre: Contemporary Romance | Narrator: Deacon Lee


Stop me if youâ€™ve heard this one before: girl meets player, they fall in love, player changes his ways.

Itâ€™s a good story. But itâ€™s not our story. Ours is a lot more colorful.

When I met Dee I knew right away that she was special. When she met me, she thought I was anything but specialâ€”I was exactly like every other guy whoâ€™d screwed her over and let her down. It took some time to convince her otherwise, but turns out I can make a convincing argument when sex is at stake.

You might know where this storyâ€™s headed. But the best part isn't where we ended up.

Itâ€™s how we got there.

TAMED goes back in time to the Tangled days. But this time around, itâ€™s not Drew dishing out the advice and opinionsâ€”itâ€™s his best friend Matthew, who of course is dealing with Dee Dee.


Tied (Tangled Book 4) by Emma Chase
===================================
English | MP3 96kbps CBR | 06:48:41 | ISBN: 1442375175 | 280 MB
Genre: Contemporary Romance | Narrator: Sebastian York


In the fourth sexy romance by the New York Times bestselling author of Tangled and Twisted, Drew and Kate canâ€™t wait to tie the knotâ€”if they can survive the pre-wedding festivities.

For most of my life, I never imagined Iâ€™d get married. But Kate did the impossible: she changed me. I think we can all agree I was pretty frigging awesome before, but now Iâ€™m even better.

The road to this day wasnâ€™t all rainbows and boners. There were mistakes and misunderstandings worthy of a Greek tragedy. But Kate and I made it through with our inexhaustible lust, boundless admiration, and everlasting love for one another intact.

That being said, there were some unexpected incidents in Vegas last weekend that could have been a problem. It was kind ofâ€¦my final test.

I know what youâ€™re thinkingâ€”what the hell did you do this time? Relax. Letâ€™s not judge, or call for my castration, until youâ€™ve heard the whole story.

And hold on tight, because youâ€™re in for a wild ride. Did you expect anything less?
